title: Priyanka Chopra lets outfit do the talking as she promotes The Sky Is Pink
text:
Priyanka Chopra is the definition of pretty in pink (Picture: GC Images)

Priyanka Chopra let her outfit do the talking in New York, while promoting new film The Sky Is Pink.

The 37-year-old couldn’t wipe the smile from her face as she hit up Manhattan on Tuesday.

And, just in case we all didn’t get the memo about her upcoming movie, the Quantico actress was dressed head-to-toe in pink.

She was spotted rocking a bright bubblegum shade jumper, which she paired with a lighter, knee-length skirt.

Clutching a wicker handbag, Nick Jonas’ wife finished the outfit off with baby pink heels.

She’s nothing if not dedicated to the theme.

Priyanka stayed on theme while promoting new film, The Sky Is Pink (Picture: GC Images)

She recently returned to Bollywood for the first time in three years (Picture: GC Images)

Priyanka is currently in the US to promote her new film, The Sky Is Pink – which follows the story of Aisha Chaudhary, who sadly died when she was 18-yeard-old, after being diagnosed with pulmonary fibrosis.

Advertisement

It marks her return to Bollywood following a three-year absence, in which she starred in Quantico and happened to get married in a lavish wedding to Nick Jonas.

She’s been busy.

But the actress might have plans to take a longer break from Hindi cinema, after teasing that she would love to play James Bond.

Priyanka Chopra would be keen to replace Daniel Craig as James Bond (Picture: Rex)

There has been a huge debate over whether Daniel Craig’s 007 replacement should be a woman – with his last stint as the spy in cinemas next April.

And Priyanka has well and truly thrown her name into the hat.

Speaking exclusively to Metro, she told us: ‘I’ve always been keen on [playing James Bond] but I can’t put myself into the race obviously.

‘I think, in my lifetime it would be amazing a female Bond. Whether that’s me or someone else, it’s something I would love to see.

Which actress would she love to see stepping into Daniel’s suave shoes?

‘Me!,’ she joked. ‘I don’t know, I would just be very happy with the fact that it would be a woman.

‘I definitely think [it’s time].’

The Sky Is Pink is released in cinemas on 11 October.
